playerDeck.name: Flurry of Blows
playerDeck.description: You deal 4 damage. This card is automatically played again the next two turns.

playerDeck.name: Iaijutsu
playerDeck.description: If this is the first card played this turn, you deal 20 damage. Otherwise, deal 12 damage. You gain first-turn priority next turn.

immediateEffect.script: int damage = Battle.CardsPlayedThisTurn == 0 ? 20 : 12; DealDamage(Opponent, damage); Player.HasPriority = true;

playerDeck.name: Brute Force
playerDeck.description: For the rest of the match, each successive consecutive Punch card you play deals 110% (multiplicative x1.10) more damage than the last. This buff is lost if you play any card other than Punch.

hooks.OnPlay: if (Card != null && Card.Name == "Punch") { if (!State.ContainsKey("multiplier")) State["multiplier"] = 1.0; State["multiplier"] = (double)State["multiplier"] * 1.1; Log("Brute Force multiplier: " + State["multiplier"] + "x!"); } else if (Card != null && Card.Name != "Punch" && !Card.IsWaitCard) { Status.RemainingDuration = 0; Log("Brute Force buff lost!"); }

playerDeck.name: Shielding
playerDeck.description: Block 25% of damage for three turns, exploding for 100% of damage blocked when expires.

hooks.OnTakeDamage: int blocked = (int)(IncomingDamage * 0.25); IncomingDamage -= blocked; if (!State.ContainsKey("absorbed")) State["absorbed"] = 0; State["absorbed"] = (int)State["absorbed"] + blocked; Log("Shield absorbs " + blocked + " damage! Total stored: " + State["absorbed"]);

playerDeck.name: Block
playerDeck.description: Apply a shield for the next attack blocking half the damage

hooks.OnTakeDamage: Amount = (int)(Amount * 0.5); Log(Player.Name + "'s block absorbs half the damage!");

playerDeck.name: Shielding
playerDeck.description: Block 25% of damage for three turns, exploding for 100% of damage blocked when expires.

hooks.OnTakeDamage: int blocked = (int)(IncomingDamage * 0.25); IncomingDamage -= blocked; if (!State.ContainsKey("absorbed")) State["absorbed"] = 0; State["absorbed"] = (int)State["absorbed"] + blocked; Log("Shield absorbs " + blocked + " damage! Total stored: " + State["absorbed"]);

playerDeck.name: RadPunch
playerDeck.description: Deal 10 damage with a 25% chance to irradiate (3 damage/turn).

immediateEffect.script: DealDamage(Opponent, 10); if (Rng.Next(100) < 25) { ApplyIrradiate(Opponent); Log(Opponent.Name + " is irradiated!"); }

playerHand.name: Block
playerHand.description: Apply a shield for the next attack blocking half the damage

hooks.OnTakeDamage: Amount = (int)(Amount * 0.5); Log(Player.Name + "'s block absorbs half the damage!");

hooks.OnTakeDamage: Amount = (int)(Amount * 0.5); Log(Player.Name + "'s block absorbs half the damage!");

opponentDeck.name: Arc
opponentDeck.description: Deal 10 damage plus 10 more for each card target has in hand

immediateEffect.script: int baseDamage = 10; int bonusDamage = OpponentHand.Count * 10; int totalDamage = baseDamage + bonusDamage; DealDamage(Opponent, totalDamage);

opponentDeck.name: Block
opponentDeck.description: Apply a shield for the next attack blocking half the damage

hooks.OnTakeDamage: Amount = (int)(Amount * 0.5); Log(Player.Name + "'s block absorbs half the damage!");

opponentHand.name: Release the Magic Smoke
opponentHand.description: Reduce both you and your opponent's HP to 10% (maximum, will not raise lower HP)

immediateEffect.script: int playerTarget = (int)(Player.MaxHP * 0.10); int opponentTarget = (int)(Opponent.MaxHP * 0.10); if (Player.CurrentHP > playerTarget) Player.CurrentHP = playerTarget; if (Opponent.CurrentHP > opponentTarget) Opponent.CurrentHP = opponentTarget; Log("The magic smoke is released! Both players reduced to 10% HP!");

opponentHand.name: Block
opponentHand.description: Apply a shield for the next attack blocking half the damage

hooks.OnTakeDamage: Amount = (int)(Amount * 0.5); Log(Player.Name + "'s block absorbs half the damage!");

opponentHand.name: Block
opponentHand.description: Apply a shield for the next attack blocking half the damage

hooks.OnTakeDamage: Amount = (int)(Amount * 0.5); Log(Player.Name + "'s block absorbs half the damage!");

immediateEffect.script: if (OpponentQueue.Count > 0) { var stunned = OpponentQueue[0]; OpponentQueue.RemoveAt(0); OpponentDiscard.Add(stunned); Log(Opponent.Name + " is tazed! " + stunned.Name + " is cancelled!"); } else { Log(Opponent.Name + " has nothing to stun!"); }

battleLog: Battle started: Captain Superior vs Amazing Marveller!
